stories.text:
I'm happy that my company is growing! I'm doing my best to keep the administrative part of the business synced and simple. But it seems like there are so many options to pick from.

So I thought it'd be cool to hear about your experiences, if you're working/have worked in the small business space. What have you found useful, functional, and/or frictionless?
stories.title: Ask HN: What admin services/platforms do you recommend for new small businesses?

stories.text:
I published this post in September 2021 - https://joelx.com/google-ads-dark-patterns/16883/.

That same month, my Google organic traffic to 3,200 posts on my site cratered to zero.

Google Search Console shows no manual actions and no problems with the site.

I also had published some conservative posts, though nothing with misinformation about the election or coronavirus. Mostly my views on patents and such.
stories.title: Google Blocked My Site After My Post on Google Ads Monopolistic Dark Patterns
